1.title: To Begin with ...

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

1.plot: On the last day of summer school, Amy and Ricky elope, leaving John with Amy's dad. Dylan and Ben's after hours visit to Dylan's private school is followed by a school fire and Ben's Dad overhears him discussing it on the phone. Anne is feeling out of touch in Palm Springs after her coming out and no one is returning her calls. George catches Ashley and Toby in bed together.

2.title: Shotgun

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

2.plot: The three mothers (Nora, Anne and Margaret) are all waiting for Ricky and Amy to return home to pick up John. All suspect that Amy and Ricky have eloped. Meanwhile Ben faints while visiting with Adrian's father. Ben's father is pursuing an investigation of his own.

3.title: I Do and I Don't...

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

3.plot: It's the first day of the new school year and all of Amy and Ricky's friends are celebrating their wedding. Except Ben, Ben is having a melt-down.

4.title: Lies and Byes

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

4.plot: Amy and Ricky struggle with the decision to pretend to be married. Ben visits Adrian's dad for help with his situation. Meanwhile Ann, Nora, Ricky's parents and Lauren and Madison are planning a wedding party for Amy and Ricky.

5.title: Past History

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

5.plot: Amy thinks she accidentally loses the thousand dollars Mimsy gave her. Ethan has his eye on the new girl Kathy who also happens to be Amy's pregnant mentee.

6.title: Holy Rollers

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

6.plot: Grace seems to persuade almost everyone to go to church, but a few surprises make everyone's church going experience far from perfect.

7.title: Girlfriends

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

7.plot: Amy encourages Kathy to make girlfriends.

8.title: Setting Things Straight

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

8.plot: Amy is jealous of Ricky's new life at college.

9.title: Property Not for Sale

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

9.plot: Ethan butts in when he meets the adoptive parents for Kathy's baby and Margaret punishes him for his behavior.

10.title: Regrets

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

10.plot: Adrian and Omar think about moving in together; Anne starts to plan Amy's wedding.

11.title: Half Over

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

11.plot: Jack is still in the hospital and Ricky confides in George about the wedding.

12.title: Hedy's Happy Holiday House

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

12.plot: Christmas Eve and Ricky tells Amy about his holiday tradition as a kid of breaking into Hedy's Happy Holiday House.

13.title: To Each Her Own

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

13.plot: Amy and Ricky continue planning their wedding, so Amy buys her dress - at a thrift store. The dress is a little worse for wear - but only Amy sees the potential to make it great. Meanwhile, Ricky is upset about the dress and Adrian thinks the dress reflects her feelings about getting married. Kathy is conflicted about going back home after having the baby, and Ethan begs his parents to let him fly to Texas with her to ask Kathy's parents if she can stay. Jack is still recovering and is in love with Grace. George tells Anne about seeing David with biological children, ...

14.title: It's a Miracle

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

14.plot: Ben is in a euphoric mood, while driving Ethan to the airport he has an epiphany that Amy may not have been his first love. Omar leaves his student teaching job and proposes to Adrian. Ethan pleads with Kathy's parents to let her return home with him. Ricky confides in Dr. Fields about Amy's lack of enthusiasm towards their marriage - and Amy confides in Dr. Fields that she has other hopes and dreams. Meanwhile, Jack is restless with his injuries and enlists Grace's help. And, George meets with David to discuss Robie's paternity.

15.title: Untying the Knot

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

15.plot: Anne is furious with George for lying about Robie's paternity and calls off Amy and Ricky's wedding, inadvertently revealing the truth about their non-marriage. Jack refuses to get help as he struggles to come to terms with everything he's been through. Nora encourages George to work things out with Anne. Meanwhile, Ethan is not happy when Kathy and Chloe become friends.

16.title: Shiny and New

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

16.plot: Amy heads to NY to tour a college campus and is confused about his feelings for Clementine.

17.title: Fraid So

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

17.plot: George and Reverend Stone insist that Jack see a therapist, but it's Adrian's advice that ultimately persuades him to go. Ricky feels Amy's absence as he juggles taking care of John with his work and school responsibilities. Cathy is stunned when she learns that her ex-boyfriend wants to see their baby. Amy realizes that she doesn't want to lose Ricky. Meanwhile, Leo secures an important business account.

18.title: Money for Nothin'

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

18.plot: Ricky tries to find a way to support Amy's dream of going to Hudson University, despite everyone's reservations about their relationship. Amy worries about her future when her meeting with the college counselor doesn't go quite like she'd expected. Adrian is furious when Omar asks her to move to New York. Jack considers suing the university for failing to prevent his attack. Meanwhile, Ethan is determined to learn the real reason Don is in town.

19.title: Interference

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

19.plot: Ethan is convinced no adult actually uses algebra, but a chance meeting with Danica McKellar helps him look at math in a different light. Amy's frantic search for her missing wedding bands leads her to Ben, who advises her to break-up with Ricky before it's too late. George and Kathleen's romantic dinner is interrupted by an uninvited guest. Meanwhile, Mrs. Stone confronts Grace about her relationship with Jack.

20.title: First and Last

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

20.plot: Amy and Ricky announce they will get married the day after Amy graduates from high school, but everyone is skeptical that the wedding will actually happen. Grace and Jack announce their engagement, but it's soon clear that Grace is having second thoughts about her decision. George and Kathleen are distracted from their secret plans when their mothers arrive for unexpected visits, but they eventually include their families in a special surprise. Meanwhile, Ethan is jealous when Kathy agrees to help Brian prepare for the spelling bee.

21.title: All My Sisters with Me

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

21.plot: Amy, Adrian and Grace struggle to reconcile their pending marriages with their individual dreams. Anne begins to feel like an outsider in her own family but soon finds an unexpected ally in Kathleen. Kathy and Ethan get into a fight after Ethan questions the status of their relationship. Leo worries about Ben's obsession with Amy. Meanwhile, Chloe reconnects with someone from her past.

22.title: When Bad Things Happen to Bad People

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

22.plot: Adrian is devastated by Omar's decision and takes her pain out on Ricky and Jack. Ben refuses to give up on his dream of reuniting with Amy and makes a shocking confession to Alice. Ethan and Margaret have an honest conversation about his relationship with Kathy. Meanwhile, Clementine returns to town and pays Ricky a visit.

23.title: Caught in a Trap

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

23.plot: After discovering that Anne tried to convince Amy to go to NY alone, Ricky gives Amy an ultimatum.

24.title: Thank You and Goodbye

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

24.plot: Amy breaks up with Ricky. Ricky will take care of John throughout Amy's college career.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

1.plot: Fifteen year old Amy Juergens's life is turned upside down when she finds out she's pregnant.

2.title: You Are My Everything

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

2.plot: Ricky continues to look for more from his relationship with Amy.

3.title: I Feel Sick

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

3.plot: Amy is scared her secret may be revealed to her parents.

4.plot: Amy and Ben's relationship grows stronger.

5.plot: Amy makes a decision about her pregnancy.

6.plot: Amy reveals her secret to her mother.

11.plot: Adrian is missing which prompts her dad to get involved in her life.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

12.plot: Amy and Ben make a rushed decision that could change their lives.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

13.plot: Adrian's father tries to find out who is behind the fake I.D.s.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

14.plot: Ricky's father has a plan for Ricky and the baby.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

15.plot: Amy has a chance to find out the sex of the baby.

16.title: Chocolate Cake

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

16.plot: George is approached by his co-worker about possibly adopting Amy's baby.

17.title: Unforgiven

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

17.plot: Amy's parents interview potential adoptive parents for the baby.

18.title: Making Up Is Hard to Do

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

18.plot: Ricky attempts to sabotage the adoption. Meanwhile, Ashley tries to persuade Ben to return to Amy.

19.title: Money for Nothing, Chicks for Free

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

19.plot: Anne wants Amy to join her in looking for jobs. Thomas gets Ashley to invite him for a visit. Grace gets an idea on how Adrian can lure her step-brother to have sex with her. Jack is selling candy bars. For real.

20.title: Maybe Baby

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

20.plot: Amy's friends come up with a plan to help Amy's decision about the baby.

21.title: Whoomp! (There It Is)

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

21.plot: Adrian and Grace plan Amy's baby shower.

22.title: One Night at Band Camp

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

22.plot: While preparing to give birth, Amy reminisces how, this one time, at band camp, she got a crush on Ricky. Others also happen to think back to that time, how different things were back then.

23.title: And Unto Us, a Child Is Born

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

23.plot: Amy's baby is born, but she has hard time adjusting to full-time motherhood. Elsewhere, George and Ashley move out.

1.title: The Big One

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

1.plot: Amy struggles to balance her life as a new mom.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

2.plot: Grace thinks her actions are to blame for her dad's death.

3.plot: Ricky intervenes when Grace isolates herself from her friends and family.

4.plot: George and Ashley attempt to help Amy with her hectic schedule.

5.plot: Amy tries to find a way to accompany Ben on his trip.

6.plot: Amy discovers her summer is going to be filled with working and school.

7.title: Summertime

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

7.plot: George makes a big revelation to Anne.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

8.plot: Adrian pushes George and Anne together.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

9.plot: Adrian and Amy's fighting escalates and Ricky intervenes.

10.title: Knocked Up, Who's There?

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

10.plot: Grace makes an impression on Adrian.

11.title: Cramped

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

11.plot: Amy is jealous when Ashley gets her own room in the garage

12.title: Be My, Be My Baby

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

12.plot: George gives Ricky and Ben some much needed advice. Ricky and Adrienne go to couples therapy and Adrienne shares a very personal story explaining why she wants commitment so badly. Grace continues to argue with her mom over dating so soon and decides she isn't ready for a serious relationship herself. When Anne goes into labor they come to the conclusion that they won't make it to the hospital in time so George, Amy, and Ashley are forced to deliver the baby at home. Adrienne and Ricky spend the night together and Ricky finally says the words Adrienne has been waiting...

13.title: You Don't Know What You've Got

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

13.plot: The gang ditches school causing the school counselor to chase them down.

14.title: 'Til It's Gone

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

14.plot: Anne runs into an ex-boyfriend and Amy is attracted to his son.

15.title: Loved and Lost

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

15.plot: Ricky and Adrian get into a fight over money.

16.title: Just Say Me

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

16.plot: Grace makes a new campaign that takes over the school. Adrian tries to continue befriending Amy.

17.title: The Second Time Around

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

17.plot: George tries to win Anne back, while Ben and Grace connect.

18.title: Let's Try That Again

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

18.plot: Amy is concerned when Jimmy doesn't call her so she seeks Ricky's help.

19.title: The Rhythm of Life

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

19.plot: Gossip is spreading fast which causes people to make revelations.

20.title: Mistakes Were Made

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

20.plot: Adrian makes a confession to Ricky.

21.title: Choices

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

21.plot: Ricky confronts his mom about the past abuse.

22.title: Good Girls and Boys

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

22.plot: Ricky, Ben, Amy, and Adrian try to work out all of their differences.

23.title: I Got You, Babe

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

23.plot: Ricky tries to get George's assistance in getting joint custody.

24.title: Ben There, Done That

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

24.plot: John's first birthday is here. Ricky and Amy come to an agreement about John's party, however Amy sabotages it. Meanwhile, Adrian harbors a big secret.

1.title: Do Over

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

1.plot: Adrian tells Ben that she's not pregnant, much to his relief, but he questions whether she's telling the truth. Unbeknownst to Anne, George takes Ashley to the doctor to discuss birth control options. Jack's parents are moving out of town for a new job and give him the option to stay with a friend while he finishes school. Amy is confused about why Ben is avoiding her after he professed his love to her, and Ricky takes an interest in Ashley.

2.title: Accentuate the Positive

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

2.plot: Though Ben and Amy are excited to be back together, Amy weighs an opportunity to study music over the summer in New York, but has to juggle her responsibilities as a mother, and Ben is still uncertain if Adrian has been honest with him. Meanwhile, Ashley skips school to help comfort Adrian through bouts of morning sickness, and Ricky, who overhears that Adrian might be pregnant, goes to confront her about it. And Jack is desperately trying to find someone to stay with so that his parents can move away.

3.title: Get Out of Town

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

3.plot: Everyone rallies around Amy so she can attend the music program.

4.title: Goodbye Amy Juergens

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

4.plot: Amy, still unaware that Adrian is pregnant, is off to New York for the summer, and she and Ben profess their love at the airport. In the early morning hours, Ben goes to Ricky's apartment for advice on Adrian, and finds that Ricky has a new love interest. Adrian looks to her mother for guidance, who talks about her own experience as a teen mother and offers her support for whatever Adrian decides. George is worried about Amy being alone in New York, and about Ricky moving into Amy's room while she's gone to help care for John, putting Ricky and Ashley under one roof. ...

5.title: Which Way Did She Go?

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

5.plot: With Amy away in New York at music camp, a ridiculous rumor that she is pregnant again spreads through school. Adrian has decided she does not want to keep the baby, but her parents argue over whose choice that should be. Jack moves into the Bowmans' guest house with Tom, and Ricky is living with the Juergens to help with John. Ashley and Ricky share an intimate moment.

6.title: She Went That A'way

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

6.plot: Everyone is finding out about Adrian's decision, except Amy.

7.title: New York, New York

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

7.plot: Ben goes to New York to visit Amy and finally tell her the news.

8.title: The Sounds of Silence

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

8.plot: Amy reaches out to Adrian and Ricky asks Ruben for help.

9.title: Chicken Little

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

9.plot: Ashley is torn between her feelings for Ricky and Grant.

10.title: My Girlfriend's Back

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

10.plot: Ricky visits Amy in New York, and Ben goes with Adrian for a sonogram.

11.title: Lady Liberty

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

11.plot: Ben gets fired from the butcher shop after an altercation with Ricky.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

13.title: Up All Night

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

13.plot: Amy's back from New York and asks Ricky to spend the night (platonically). Ben and Adrian discuss the possibility of having sex again but talk of their exes soon intervenes. Meanwhile Grant overhears Jack and Jesse discussing Jack's continued feelings for Grace. Across town Alice and Henry share a bed while waiting for Ben to return home. Ricky and Amy agree to a date.

14.title: Rules of Engagement

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

14.plot: Ashley shows up in Ricky's bed telling him that she wants to get "it" over with and for it to be with him. Ben finds out the value of the ring that he gave to Adrian and decides to earn enough money to buy it. George and Anne reconsider getting remarried. Amy & Ben finally have their first long talk since her return from New York. Grace's mother gets Grant to commit to a promise that Grace doesn't agree with. Ricky, Amy & John have their first real date.

15.title: Who Do You Trust

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

15.plot: Returning to school after the summer break, Ben and Adrian go to find out the sex of their baby. Amy tells Ricky that she is ready to take the next step in their relationship, but only if he first agrees to be tested for STDs.

16.title: Mirrors

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

16.plot: When the high school guidance counselor shows up at their home, George and Ashley learn a bit about home-schooling. Ricky's mom gets out on parole and needs a place to stay. When Grant suggests that Grace get tested for STD's and Jack agrees, Grace reacts badly. Amy checks up with Lauren following her break-up. Ben is eager to have Adrian move in with him and perhaps even tie the knot.

17.title: Guess Who's Not Coming to Dinner

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

17.plot: Ricky discovers that his mother's date is another woman. Ben makes a decision about Adrian.

18.title: Another Proposal

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

18.plot: Adrian's pregnancy hormones mix with her dreams of a big wedding and the results are scary for all involved. While Amy is incensed, Ben tries to go along with it all but is confronted first by Ricky and then by the parentals with a proposal of their own. Meanwhile Amy returns home and presents Ricky with a proposition as well.

19.title: Deeper and Deeper

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

19.plot: Ashley studies with another home schooled student.

20.title: Moving in and Out

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

20.plot: Ashley's upset that Amy and Ricky are moving in together. Grant and Grace are enjoying their decision to have sex. Amy has a conversation with Adrian and soon the entire gang is getting competitive over sex. Ricky has a talk with Ben and suggest that they both "be men" and be honest with their significant others.

21.title: Young at Heart

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

21.plot: Ricky is frustrated waiting to have sex with Amy. Ben and Adrian aren't waiting and Adrian's been pleasantly surprised. Grant brings his parents by to meet Grace and her mom.

22.title: Loose Lips

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

22.plot: A problem with the guest list for Adrian's shower reignites the Amy/Adrian feud and tempers flare to new heights. The entire crew seems to get pulled into the dispute no matter how unwilling and things get said that may end friendships and relationships forever.

23.title: Round II

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

23.plot: Pretty much everyone needs to apologize after the recent round of blow-ups. Grace gets some good advise from Grant's "old man." And then there's the matter of Adrian's shower.

24.title: It's Not Over Till It's Over

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

24.plot: In a moment of panic, Ben admits to Amy that he's not ready to be a husband and father at 17. Betty hears about a family crisis and must miss Ben's wedding. Jack's dad comes back to town to officiate at the wedding and suggests that Jack should break up with Madison if she's only his second choice.

25.title: To Be...

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

25.plot: Jack & Madison have sex for the first time at Ricky's place and now both have regrets. Amy hears about their tryst and gets upset with Ricky for lending the place out and for the amount of usage Ricky's bed has seen. Ricky's mom gives him some advice on romance. Meanwhile Ben & Adrian begin their married life together with a surprise reception at school. When Jack approaches Grant for some relationship advice, Grant and Grace discuss their continuing relationships with their exes.

26.title: ... or Not to Be

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

26.plot: Adrian and Ben go to the hospital in preparation for the baby.

1.title: When One Door Closes

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

1.plot: Adrian is depressed and not leaving the house.

2.title: Another One Opens

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

2.plot: Adrian is mourning the loss of the baby. Ashley and Toby are driving cross country. When Amy moves in with Ricky, George considers some home remodeling. Ricky gives Ben some advice about the situation with Adrian.

3.title: When Opportunity Knocks

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

3.plot: Grace has a secret from her recent trip.

4.title: One Foot Out the Door

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

4.plot: When John runs a slight fever, Ricky and Amy argue over whether or not John needs to go to the emergency room. George tells Ashley that she must get a job if she's going to stay in Florida. Ben and his dad disagree about whether Ben should end his marriage.

5.title: Hole in the Wall

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

5.plot: Adrian decides to empty out the nursery to help deal with her feelings.

6.title: Don't Go in There

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

6.plot: Ricky has an interview with a local college but it doesn't go as planned.

7.title: Cute

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

7.plot: Grace tries to fit in to Daniel's college world.

8.title: Dancing with the Stars

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

8.plot: Amy tries to convince Ricky to take her to the senior dance.

9.title: Flip Flop

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

9.plot: Adrian changes her mind about Ben and sets her targets on someone else.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

10.plot: Amy is upset with Ricky over a voicemail.

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

12.title: Pomp

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

12.plot: Jesse is throwing a graduation night party at his parent's lake house. Ricky finds out that he's valedictorian. Adrian vows to Ricky that she will have him again.

13.title: And Circumstance

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

13.plot: Henry and Alice's break-up has them fighting over custody of Ben's friendship. Adrian decides that she needs one last kiss from Ricky to resolve her feelings for him. Jack asks Grace to help him write the invocation for graduation but it's primarily a ploy to spend time with her. Ricky delivers the valedictory graduation speech but adds a surprise finish.

14.title: Smokin' Like a Virgin

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

14.plot: Ben asks Dylan, the girl he met at the party out on a date but cancels when he hears that Adrian slept with Henry. Grace tries to figure out what she still feels for Jack after kissing him at the party. Ricky is surprised that Amy's in no hurry to get married after accepting his proposal. Adrian tries to contact Omar to patch things up.

15.title: Defiance

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

15.plot: Amy decides to go to summer school instead of work.

16.title: They Gotta Eat

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

16.plot: Amy, Lauren and Madison's dads arrange a dinner for their daughters.

17.title: Suddenly Last Summer

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

17.plot: George is convinced Anne has feelings for someone close to him and Amy thinks she's pregnant again.

18.title: The Beach Is Back

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

18.plot: George and Kathleen bond at the 'beach.'

19.title: The Splits

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

19.plot: Ben and Dylan go on their first official date.

20.title: Strange Familiar

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

20.plot: Kathleen tries to bribe Grace into speaking with Jacob.

21.title: Allies

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

21.plot: The guidance counselor warns Amy she is failing out of summer school.

22.title: The Text Best Thing

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

22.plot: Amy suggests the 4th of July for a tentative wedding date and the texting grapevine spreads the news. Jack is still hoping to rekindle his relationship with Grace. George thinks his ex-wife Anne might be gay. Ben's new girl gang pressure him into resuming his friendship with Henry.

23.title: 4SnP

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

23.plot: Rumors about Anne (and Amy) being gay go wild. Ben asks his dad about going to an exclusive private school his senior year. Grace makes an embarrassing admission about a fantasy to Adrian and then goes overboard to disprove it.

24.title: Love Is Love

episode of.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager (TV Series 2008–2013)

24.plot: Anne and Ashley are home from their trip and Anne is pissed that George started the silly gay rumor. Grace is still reeling from her experimental kiss with Adrian (and liking it). Adrian's mom cautions her that folks in the LGBTQ community may not like her grabbing attention by exploiting what to them is a serious question. At the urging of his new girlfriend, Ben charges a $1200 school application fee to his credit card despite his dad having vetoed Ben's changing schools.

imdb.plot outline: The series documents the evermore complicated yet heart warming life of Amy Juergens; a typical high-school student who is characterized by her ambition and musical talent. However, it is after one hormonal-driven night at Band Camp, that she is faced with a responsibility no 15-year-old wants to take; being a teen mom. The audience is taken on a journey with Amy as she confronts her problem and the father of her baby.
imdb.title: The Secret Life of the American Teenager
plot: After an unplanned pregnancy, teenager Amy Juergens's life will never be the same, as she deals with other teenagers around her.

The series documents the evermore complicated yet heart warming life of Amy Juergens; a typical high-school student who is characterized by her ambition and musical talent. However, it is after one hormonal-driven night at Band Camp, that she is faced with a responsibility no 15-year-old wants to take; being a teen mom. The audience is taken on a journey with Amy as she confronts her problem and the father of her baby.::B.Oliveria
synopsis: 15 year old Amy Juergens go to band camp and has sex for the first time with bad boy, Ricky Underwood. As the school year begins she finds out the terrifying news that she is pregnant. Now, Amy must learn to adapt to life as a pregnant teenager in high school while trying to balance her romantic connection with the rich, good boy Ben Boykewich and dodging the father of her babys on and off girlfriend Adrian Lee. In the midst of this unplanned pregnancy is Grace Bowman, a Christian girl who is proud that she is waiting to have sex after she is married, and her boyfriend, Jack Pappas, who is also a Christian, but does not think he can follow in her footsteps. As tension arises between people involving abortion, adoption, sexual abuse, child custody, drugs, family, friends and of course sex, each one of these teenagers try to find their way through life and love.
